column4: not quite, no. I've got a load of different video files and I want to rename them into a consistent pattern
so do you have a file renaming problem, or  a file format tagging problem?

it's more that I like the way EasyTag allows me to both rename files and sort ID3 tags. So I could have a folder of audio files and mass rename the "artist" component whilst leaving the rest untouched, or label tracks in numerical order
